amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to extend Brady background checks to gun shows, regulate firearms transfers at gun shows, prohibit firearms possession by violent juvenile offenders, and specify penalties for weapons transfers to juveniles and unlawful acts by juveniles.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 12 and and deemed printed in part B of H. Rept. 106-186 to extend Brady background checks to gun shows, regulate firearms transfers at gun shows, prohibit firearms possession by violent juvenile offenders, and specify penalties for weapons transfers to juveniles and unlawful acts by juveniles.

action.text: Amendment (A011) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Conyers.
Conyers amendment (A011) modified by unanimous consent. The modification that specifies that it is unlawful for a person in or affecting interstate commerce to transfer a weapon to a juvenile.
On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A011) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 242 (Roll no. 243).
